tag_list: marketing, technology, security, executive, lead-generation, product-marketing, event-marketing, website, online-marketing, interactive-marketing, analyst-relations, public-relations
overview: Matt Anthony is the VP Marketing at Pindrop Security. Until joining Pindrop in April 2012, Matt served as Director of Marketing at Dell, which acquired SecureWorks in 2011. Matt spent 5 years at SecureWorks as Vice President of Marketing in a variety of roles with responsibilities that included product and segment marketing, demand generation, event and interactive marketing. Prior to SecureWorks, Matt was Director of Marketing at CipherTrust for 5 years, where he was one of the earliest employees. CipherTrust was acquired by Secure Computing. Anthony spent the early years of his career at Dell Computer.
